summary: TAKATA RECALL THIS ISSUE IS THIS:  I BOUGHT THE CAR IN DECEMBER 2015   FIRST MY ENGEN LIGHT COMES ON, THAN MY TRACTION CONTROLE LIGHT, THAN MY CAR TELLS ME TO SERVICE TRACTION CONTROLE, ENGEN POWER IS REDUCED, SERVICE STABIL TRACK, THE ENGEN CUTS I LOOSE POWER STEERING, AND I HAVE TO PULL OVER FOR 15 MIN WAITING FOR THE CAR TO REBOOT.  I HAVE HAD THE CAR TO THE GM SHOP EVERY 2500-3000 MILES.  THE SHOP REPLACED ALL THE FACTORY COVERED PARTS  AND NOW WILL START GUESSING.  THE FIRST FIX IS REPLACING SOME WIRES THAT ANOTHER SHOP REPLACED IN AN ATTEMPT TO FIX THIS SAME PROBLEM.  NO ONE WILL FIX THIS DEATH TRAP.  I WILL NOT DRIVE IT.
